item.description:
Do you feel like your mind is out of control, like it "runs" you?

How much time do you spend thinking about this and that, planning or worrying about the future, or just "in your head" instead of in your experience?

When you do this, what are you missing? What opportunities are lost? What are you creating and not creating?

In this month's guided meditation evening, we’ll be focusing on the theme of “Mindfulness and this delicious moment: the power of being present and in your now”. We’ll be addressing questions like:

  • What does it mean to be mindful and how do you do it?
  • What are the benefits of being mindful and present in the now?

I’ll be guiding you through three powerful guided meditations to get you deeply present and to help you be mindful. One of them is called “This delicious moment” and it involves real food!

If you want to join us in this community event:

1. RSVP YES on our meetup site
2. Bring a food for yourself that you really enjoy and can use for the guided meditation. (Ideas: chocolate, fruit, a piece of pastry – something you can really get your senses into.)

Note: When you RSVP yes to events, we plan on you being there!  Please be considerate of us as your hosts, and let us know if your plans change so we won’t be waiting for you unnecessarily, leaving people on a waiting list, or wasting handouts and snacks. Thank you!

We share these public community events with you because of their strong applicability to successfully using the law of attraction.

Thank you to Earthsong Yoga for co-sponsoring this public event with us and providing the space!  Check out all their great classes at www.earthsongyoga.com.
item.how_to_find_us: It's the big, old Corey building, only sign is on sidewalk. Studio is upstairs, in room 14. Easy parking

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Free evening of guided meditations on Mindfulness and This Delicious Moment
